metadata.title: Women Short Sleeve Tops Summer Trendy Printed T Shirts Button Neckline Tees Ladies Blouses
features: Material: High-quality polyester + cotton linen material, super soft fabric, light and breathable, soft and skin-friendly, loose and elegant, if you like a loose fit, you can buy 1-2 sizes up.
Multi-Colors: Various pattern options. Advanced printing technology can prevent the pattern from fading and falling.
Features: Women casual blouse featured Fresh and stylish style, sexy v-neck, short sleeve, loose fit, floral print top, detachable chest button, super cute.
Match: You can wear this button-up top with jeans, leggings, shorts, yoga pants, slacks, boots, heels, jackets or coats and more.
Occasion: This classic shirt can be worn on many different occasions, parties, work, clubs, vacations and more.
description: Size chart: Size: S US: 6 UK: 10 EU: 36 Bust: 94cm/37.01'' Sleeve: 20cm/7.87'' Length: 65cm/25.59'' Size: M US: 8 UK: 12 EU: 38 Bust: 98cm/38.58'' Sleeve: 21cm/8.27'' Length: 66cm/25.98'' Size: L US: 10 UK: 14 EU: 40 Bust: 102cm/40.16'' Sleeve: 22cm/8.66'' Length: 67cm/26.38'' Size: XL US: 12 UK: 16 EU: 42 Bust: 106cm/41.73'' Sleeve: 23cm/9.06'' Length: 68cm/26.77'' Size: XXL US: 14 UK: 18 EU: 44 Bust: 110cm/43.31'' Sleeve: 24cm/9.45'' Length: 69cm/27.17''
